name: WebChannel
tagline: We are developing your ideas into reality.
description:
WEB CHANNEL was founded in 2001 and has grown to be Dubai's premier website design and online marketing company. Located in Sharjah, with capabilities to service clients across UAE. Since 2001, our professional team have designed and built over 2,000 websites for a diverse range of organisations across many industry groupings.
We will provide you with an innovative, attractive and professional web design that will assist you to open new markets for your business.
